experiences.description: Developed and maintained ETL pipelines for processing data from various sources, including relational databases and APIs. Implemented data quality checks and monitoring systems to ensure data accuracy and reliability. Contributed to the design and implementation of a data warehouse solution for business intelligence.

Led the development of a scalable data pipeline using Spark and Hadoop to process large datasets for machine learning applications. Mentored junior data engineers and provided technical guidance on data engineering best practices. Collaborated with data scientists to design and implement data models for predictive analytics.

Managed a team of data engineers responsible for building and maintaining the company's data infrastructure on AWS. Designed and implemented a data lake solution using S3 and Glue. Developed and maintained data governance policies and procedures. Worked with stakeholders to understand data needs and translate them into technical requirements.

education.institution: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST)
education.description: Focused on data structures, algorithms, and software development. Completed a senior project on developing a machine learning model for fraud detection.

Specialized in data mining, machine learning, and statistical modeling. Conducted research on developing novel algorithms for big data analytics. Published a paper on scalable data processing techniques.
